review.title: “Good start-up”
review.pros: Pros – The compensation was fair. Since the company is small there is a lot of attention paid to training and getting solid client exposure.
review.cons: Cons – SInce the company is small, the recession took a toll. There was less overhead for clients to pay for but also less room for the financial downturn.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The service offerings are solid. Try more service diversity for added revenues.
